project-basis: After doing a bunch of painstaking math by hand, I wrote the program in Java. The GUI is Swing.
project-future-plans: After playing Clicker Heroes for long enough, the tool becomes pretty obsolete as you learn to make optimal decisions without it most of the time. Because of this, the Clicker Heroes community didn't have much need for the tool. In fact, after building the tool, I found I never needed it when playing the game.
project-purpose: After inputting a few stats from your Clicker Heroes file, the program tells you when you should next optimally upgrade Siyalatas (one of the useful in-game upgrades.)
project-inspiration: There is a PC/mobile game called Clicker Heroes where you can defeat monsters by clicking on them and gain gold. The game includes many different upgrades and it's sometimes difficult for new players to figure out optimal strategies. There are many guides online, but I thought it would be cool to make a tool to help.
project-subtitle: Determine the optimal time to upgrade Siyalatas in "Clicker Heroes"
